Name: Super
About the game: It's pixelized platform mayhem in Venture City! Create your hero and go forth to meet your destiny. As a Super, born uniquely from the rest... you have the power to change the fate of the city. Unlock Origins, Aliases, Skills, Powers, and Devices for future super citizens. Stroll, ride, or fly through the city as hero, villain, or your average slob. The city thrives as you aid in its prosperity or dives into despair upon your neglect. Be warned... opposition sits at either end. Game Play Super is a rogue-like arcade platform adventure, set in a multi-game genre word. Create your hero from a list of Origins and Aliases ... each defining the skills, powers, and devices you may choose from. Unlock more options by defeating bosses, visiting skill shops, and discovery. As your heroes and villains become more powerful, they may yet uncover the ultimate hidden threat.
